news.title: Trump suggests Starmer could use military to control UK borders
news.summary: The US president says illegal migration "destroys countries from within", in a news conference with the PM.

news.title: First migrant deported to France under 'one in one out' deal
news.summary: The man was removed on Thursday under the "one in, one out" agreement and has arrived in Paris.

news.title: 'Cataclysmic' situation in Gaza City, UN official says, as Israeli tanks advance
news.summary: A constant of stream of Palestinians flee southwards as Israeli tanks reportedly push further into Gaza's biggest urban centre.

news.title: Corbyn and Sultana clash over new party membership
news.summary: MP Zarah Sultana says she is a victim of a "sexist boys' club" in row over setting up new left wing party.

news.title: Scientists pinpoint 'mileage clock' inside brain
news.summary: They located this key area of function by recording the brain activity of running rats.

news.title: Two teenagers charged over Transport for London cyber attack
news.summary: The police say the hack caused "significant disruption" and "millions in losses" for TfL.

news.title: UK not out of woods on inflation, says Bank of England as interest rates held
news.summary: The Bank of England governor warns "we're not out of the woods yet" in terms of rising inflation.

news.title: Author Sally Rooney says she could not collect prize in UK in case of arrest
news.summary: The author has given her support to Palestine Action, who have been proscribed as a terrorist group.

news.title: Planning approvals for new homes at record low, figures show
news.summary: Planning approvals for new homes were at their lowest on record during Labourâ€™s first year in office, figures show

news.title: Keely Hodgkinson makes winning start to 800m world title bid in Tokyo
news.summary: Great Britain's Olympic champion Keely Hodgkinson makes a winning start to her bid for a first world 800m title in Tokyo.
